name: Platformer Game (Geoffrei F Willingham)
description:
Jump around the sky-lands! Complete platforming challenges and find hidden secrets (oh and try not to fall into the ever-expansive void below you…)

CONTROLS:

Use WASD to move around

Move the mouse to move the camera around

Use space to jump

Use the right-click to spawn a platform below you

Alt+F4 to close the game

LICENSING:

Game adapted from Epic Games’ Hour of Code platformer project

Background music created by Meydan. licensed under a Creative Commons 4.0 License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Bird Sound effects taken from Chosic.com
